nodes.text: The Veil was a trio of male Human Cyborgs - Veil One, Veil Two and Veil Three - operating on Nar Shaddaa during the Galactic War. Around 3640 BBY the Veil took control over the production of the CN-12 sensor chip from the Cult of the Screaming Blade. When Sith Lord Kallig, who owned the Cult, approached the Veil for the CN-12, the Veil offered the chip in exchange for leadership of the Cult.
The Veil appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on Nar Shaddaa.
